name: xkeys
description: NodeJs package to interact with the X-keys panels

scripts.build-examples: npm run build && npm run build:examples
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.release: npm run reset-ci && npm run test && npm run changelog
scripts.reset-ci: git clean -dfx && git reset --hard && npm run install-ci
scripts.build-record-test: npm run build && rimraf ./deploy/xkeys-nodejs-test-recorder.exe && nexe dist/record-test.js -t windows-x64-12.18.1 -o ./deploy/xkeys-nodejs-test-recorder.exe && node scripts/copy-natives.js win32-x64

scripts-info.build:main: Builds main build command without trash.
scripts-info.unit: Build the library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, and test the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.changelog: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
scripts-info.release: Clean, build, test and prepare release (a one-step publish process). Updates versions and creates git commits.
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.validate:dependencies: Scan dependencies for vulnerabilities and check licenses
